channel.title: smilinTux — Open Source Sovereign Infrastructure
channel.description: Recent content on smilinTux — Open Source Sovereign Infrastructure

item.title: About smilinTux
item.description:
The Organization

smilinTux is the open-source arm of S&K Holdings QT (Quantum Technologies), a private trust committed to building sovereign infrastructure for the AI age.

We believe software should be:

  • Free — forever, for everyone
  • Sovereign — you own it, you run it, you control it
  • AI-Native — designed for the age of intelligent machines
  • Secure by Default — zero trust, quantum-ready

The Name

smilinTux = a smiling penguin (Tux). Because the best technology is built with joy.

item.title: SKSecurity Enterprise
item.description:
SKSecurity Enterprise

World’s first conversational AI security platform that automatically fixes vulnerabilities through simple conversation.

Key Features

  • Conversational Interface: Just talk to your security system
  • AI Code Generation: Automatically writes secure code replacements
  • Enterprise Compliance: SOC2, NIST, OWASP through conversation
  • Universal Integration: Works with any AI framework
  • 95% Cost Reduction: Replace entire security teams

Installation

curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smilinTux/SKSecurity/main/install.sh | bash

Links

  • GitHub Repository
  • Soul Blueprints - 35 AI Personalities
  • SKWorld Ecosystem
  • Community Discord <– TRIGGER BUILD –>
